ops.description: fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:1, type:4, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // {Barret}
“You gonna go help {Aeris}, right?
She's done so much for me…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // {Barret}
“If the Shinra're involved,
I ain't stayin' here!
I'm comin', too!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:6}); // {Aeris}
“{Cloud}!
I thought the Turks
came back! Get some rest!”
{ let pos = getEntityPosition({entityId:1}); Bank[6][4] = pos.x; Bank[6][6] = pos.y; Bank[6][8] = pos.z; Bank[6][10] = pos.triangleId; }

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:6}); // {Aeris}
“{Cloud}!
I thought the Turks
came back! Get some rest!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // Marlene
“Daddy,
{Tifa},{PAUSE} {Cloud}!
Please bring {Aeris} back!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // {Cloud}
“Can't get caught this time…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // {Cloud}
“Sector 7's past Sector 6…
I should be all right by myself…”
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:12, type:2, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:1, adjust:255});

dialogStrings:
{Aeris}
“You need to go through
Sector 6 to get to Sector 7.
Sector 6 is a little”{PAUSE}“dangerous so you'd better
get some rest tonight.”

{Cloud}
“Sector 7's past Sector 6…
I should be all right by myself…”

{Aeris}
“{Cloud}!
I thought the Turks
came back! Get some rest!”

{Barret}
“I'm so glad…
I'm so glad you're all right…”

Marlene
“Daddy, don't cry.
Your whiskers
hurt!”

{Barret}
“You gonna go help {Aeris}, right?
She's done so much for me…”

{Barret}
“If the Shinra're involved,
I ain't stayin' here!
I'm comin', too!”

Marlene
“Guess what? Guess what?
{Aeris} asked me
lots of questions.”{PAUSE}“Like what kind of person {Cloud} is.
I bet she likes you, {Cloud}!”
{CHOICE}I don't know
{CHOICE}Let's hope so

{Cloud}
“Looks like I can rest here.
{CHOICE}Sleep
{CHOICE}Don't want to sleep
